text:
UK ‘to trial’ Covid-19 #vaccine passports with new app

Thousands of Brits who have already received their #Covid19 jab will be offered a #vaccinepassport proving they have been vaccinated as part of a government-funded trial, @j_a_warrington writes -> https://t.co/aSEuuLiZDl https://t.co/N33uwxIH71
